description: Structured information on the content type of a file instance, bundle or repository.
label: Content type
name: ContentType

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/dataT._instruction: Add all data types that may be represented via this content type.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/dataT.label: Data type
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/dataT.name: dataType

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/descr._instruction: Enter a description of the content type specification. Leave blank if an official and public specification is linked under 'specification' for this content type.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/descr.description: Longer statement or account giving the characteristics of someone or something.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/descr.label: Description
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/descr.name: description

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/displ._instruction: Enter a display label for this content type.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/displ.label: Display label
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/displ.name: displayLabel

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/fileE._instruction: Enter all file extensions associated with this content type.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/fileE.description: String of characters attached as suffix to the names of files of a particular format.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/fileE.label: File extension
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/fileE.name: fileExtension

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/name._instruction: Enter the name of this content type following a IANA.org inspired convention.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/name.description: Word or phrase that constitutes the distinctive designation of a being or thing.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/name.label: Name
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/name.name: name

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/relat._instruction: Enter the internationalized resource identifier (IRI) to the official registered media type (e.g., provided on IANA.org) matching this content type.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/relat.description: Reference to an official two-part identifier for file formats and format contents.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/relat.label: Related media type
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/relat.name: relatedMediaType

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/speci._instruction: Enter the internationalized resource identifier (IRI) to the offical specification of this content type. If no offical and public specification is available, leave blank and enter the specification under 'description'.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/speci.description: Detailed and precise presentation of, or proposal for something.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/speci.label: Specification
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/speci.name: specification

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/synon._instruction: Enter any synonyms of this content type.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/synon.description: Words or expressions used in the same language that have the same or nearly the same meaning in some or all senses.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/synon.label: Synonym
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/synon.name: synonym
